metadata.title: Prime Minister condoles Javed ShahzadÃ¢ÂÂs death

content.article_body: LAHORE, Jan 12 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Sunday expressed deep grief and sorrow over the demise of senior journalist Javed Shahzad. In his condolence message here, the premier prayed that may the Allah Almighty elevate the rank of the deceased. He also expressed sympathies with the bereaved family members. Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif said that services of late Javed Shahzad in the field of journalism would be remembered forever. It is pertinent to mention here that Javed Shahzad was associated with Ausaf group.
summary: Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif condoled the death of senior journalist Javed Shahzad.
The premier prayed for the elevation of the deceased's rank and expressed sympathies with the bereaved family members.
Javed Shahzad was associated with Ausaf group and his services in journalism would be remembered forever.
